mapper.sql:
SELECT enti_pk, enti_codigo, enti_tipo, enti_max_grid , enti_cmd_alta, enti_cmd_baja, enti_cmd_edicion, enti_cmd_duplicado , tppr_es_i18n, tppr_es_tmp_exp , tpdt_pk, tpdt_codigo
, ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'enti' AND i18n_ext_pk = enti_pk AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} ) AS enti_nombre , ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'tpdt' AND i18n_ext_pk = tpdt_pk AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} ) AS tpdt_nombre
FROM tbl_tipo_parametro_tppr INNER JOIN tbl_entidad_enti ON enti_pk = tppr_pk LEFT JOIN tbl_tipo_dato_tpdt ON tpdt_pk = tppr_tpdt_pk
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_tipo_parametro_tppr INNER JOIN tbl_entidad_enti ON enti_pk = tppr_pk
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_tipo_parametro_tppr(tppr_pk, tppr_es_i18n, tppr_es_tmp_exp, tppr_tpdt_pk) VALUES (#{id}, #{i18n, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=Boolean}, #{tempExp, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=Boolean}, #{tpdtNombre.id})
